rows.label: qst002309_msg0003
rows.name:
Why, this is the very same music box
that was stolen from me...

rows.label: qst002309_msg0004
rows.name:
I see... So you were the culprits.
Come to turn yourselves in, is that it?

rows.label: qst002309_msg0005
rows.name:
Then I shall pass judgment in the
name of the Pope Marveni.

rows.label: qst002309_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, you were just asked to bring this
by a Nopon named Mololo?

rows.label: qst002309_msg0007
rows.name:
Do you know where I might
find this Nopon, perchance?
Please, take me to him.
